snippet.title: Grit and Valor - 1949 | Official Steam Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Grit and Valor – 1949 is an upcoming real-time tactics roguelite developed by Milky Tea studios! Liberate Europe from the grip of the Axis Powers using your own custom squad of elite mech units and pilots. 

The game is publicly playable for the first time in a Steam demo! Build your team and command them in real time to defeat waves of enemies. PLAY THE DEMO NOW! 

Steam: https://bit.ly/youtube-gritandvalor

Discord: https://discord.gg/4Hqf3yuXgx

#GritandValor1949 #Steam #Demo
